title: can not set club tag.
body: i have 8 members but ever since 6.9 i cant set tag for club. '_>'

replies.body:
Earlier today, we noticed an issue with clubs and tags.  Some changes were made on the back-end in order to improve the experience, but unfortunately this also caused some bugs with clubs such as tags not showing up correctly.  This may also explain why you are having some issues setting a tag for clubs.  For the time being, the best thing to do is to just sit tight while we work on getting club tags working properly.

Wish I had some better news!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dhGNuGsf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-05T21:21:11.643+0000)
>
> Earlier today, we noticed an issue with clubs and tags.  Some changes were made on the back-end in order to improve the experience, but unfortunately this also caused some bugs with clubs such as tags not showing up correctly.  This may also explain why you are having some issues setting a tag for clubs.  For the time being, the best thing to do is to just sit tight while we work on getting club tags working properly.
> 
> Wish I had some better news!

Great insight, I'll sit tight while you guys get those club tags to work. Thanks for doing such a good job. :^ )
will you be implementing special characters to the tag any time soon? thanks!
I'm having the same problem!  I have the required number of members but no button or option to set the club tag.
